name: It gets easier (Mcportugalem)
description:
It gets easier is a short, auto biographical game. I actually didn't really intend to participate in Ludum Dare until a friend of mine suggested I make "something with narrative, there's tools for that y'know?" so I did it.

It comes from the heart. Truly. And yes the doodle style is intentional. What can I say? Not much of an Artist!
